system.description: Your ability to conduct the raw stuff of magic deppens, conjuring magic out of music beyond normal spellcasting.  You gain the second Battle Hymn Specialization option if you do not already have it, or a different battle hymn specialization option if you do.  The total number of spells you may select for this ability is increased to your proficiency bonus and anytime you take a level of witch or bard you may exchange one of these spells for another one.  First and second level spells replicated this way require only 1 use of Bardic Inspiration rather than 2. You may choose any spell that does not have a material component, as opposed to those that only have a vocalized component, but may only perform those with seen components if you are benefiting from the Visual Art Specialty.  Finally, when selecting spells that are on both the witch and bard spell list, you may choose spells of any level you possess spell slots for rather than only 4th-level or lower.  Casting spells of 5th level or higher using this ability also requires expending a spell slot of the appropriate level in addition to the 2 bardic inspiration uses, but otherwise follows the normal rules for the ability.
